summary: Kabbalah is a mysterious and ancient Jewish tradition, like a secret code to understanding the Bible and Jewish teachings. It started in the 12th century and grew over time, with important leaders like Moses de Le√≥n and Isaac Luria. They wrote special books, like the Zohar, to share their wisdom. Kabbalah helps people explore the deeper meaning of their faith and has even gained interest from historians and scholars. It's a fascinating part of Jewish history and spirituality!
title: Kabbalah
